Title: Dynamic Model
Description: code for indirect implimetation of Inotifyproperychanged interface for silverlight and WPF (mvvm)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
code for indirect implimetation of Inotifyproperychanged interface for silverlight and WPF (mvvm)

Dynamic Model Allowe impliment model in MVVM environment without INotifyPropertyChanged, As result changes can be tracked.
Exception and data validation can be done without validation rule.


Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
